version_description:
- New end of game screens
- Show opponents in challenges

Thank you to all of our players for giving us such great feedback!

• Endless Mode! A premium mode without the limitations of Time or Moves. Get dots to buy power-ups or just play to relax.
• Simplified design (even more)

· Faster dot bounce animation (Thanks for your feedback)
· Speedier performance
· Fixed animation glitches
· Fixed battery usage issue

Let us know NEW themes you'd like to see!
Thanks for playing <3
--------------------
Previous Update:
Themes
· Four color themes
· Three premium themes that include fresh sound design

Designer Mode
· Chose your own dot and background colors

Other Stuff
· Cleaner, easy to navigate interface
· Higher resolution graphics for big screens
* THREE new themes based on worlds from Two Dots and Dots & Co!
* THREE new themes based on worlds from Two Dots and Dots & Co!

-Support for iPhone X
-Improvements to stability and performance.

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.
